oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A predictive reliability model for PMOS bias temperature degradation
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MAHAPATRA, S
ALAM, MA
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: mosfet
semiconductor device models
semiconductor device reliability
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bias temperature degradation is studied in p-MOSFETs. The physical mechanisms responsible for degradation over a wide range of stress bias and temperature have been identified. A novel scaling methodology is proposed that helps in obtaining a simple, analytical model useful for reliability projection.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Proceedings of the International Electron Devices Meeting, San Francisco CA, USA, 8-11 December 2002, 505-508
